chunk: Smashed avocado and banana This quick and easy no-cook recipe has a surprisingly tasty combination of avocado and banana, mashed to make a creamy delicious mix. Age: 6 months or older Prep: 10 mins Portions: 8 Ingredients - 1 medium ripe banana, chopped - 1 ripe avocado Method Place the chopped banana and avocado in a mixing bowl. Blend or mash together with a fork until smooth. Cover any leftovers and store in the fridge. Banana and avocado brown quickly so try to eat it within the same day. Information: Try adding full-fat yoghurt to the mixture for a creamier option. Weaning tip Try mashed and finger foods as soon as your baby is ready, to help them learn to chew and swallow solid foods.
title: Smashed Avocado And Banana
description: This quick and easy no-cook recipe has a surprisingly tasty combination of avocado and banana, mashed to make a creamy delicious mix.
